title: Cupcake Value Added Problem
original_question: To make each vanilla cupcake that you sell at a bake sale, you use: $3/2$ cups flour: $0.07, 2 eggs: $0.86, $2/3$ cup sugar: $0.11. You price your cupcakes at $3.50. Calculate value added.

segments.text: To make each vanilla cupcake that you sell at a bake sale,
you use: $3/2$ cups flour: $0.07, 2 eggs: $0.86, $2/3$ cup sugar: $0.11.
segments.explanation: 原材料属于中间投入，计算增值时需剔除  [cite: 32, 1846-1854]。

segments.knowledge: Market Value of Final Goods - 最终产品市场价值
segments.explanation: 最终售价是计算的基础  [cite: 32, 1255-1257]。

traps.title: Value Added $\neq$ Profit
traps.description: 增值不等于利润，因为它未扣除人工等成本。

solution.source_label: 来自已知条件：原材料清单
外部核心知识：增值衡量产出贡献，不等于利润
来自已知条件：最终价格和中间投入
